card.title: Movement 8
card.description: This card can be played to move forward 8 spaces OR used as a Dodge card (Removes Debris and Ram). To play as Movement provide the value of 0, to play as a Dodge provide 1

card.title: Debris
card.description: The five racers at the front cannot play Movement cards

card.title: Ram
card.description: Move forward 3 spaces, the racer in front of you after the move cannot play Movement cards

card.title: Crash
card.description: Played on self, move forward 1 space. Anyone in your space at the start of your next turn dies.

card.title: Mechanical Failure
card.description: Target another user, target is prevented from playing Movement cards

card.title: Sabotage
card.description: Target another user, target is killed if they end a turn with Sabotage AND another hazard applied

card.title: Heart Attack
card.description: Target another user, kills them in three turns if not removed

card.title: High G Forces
card.description: Target another user, they can't play a Movement card higher than move 2.

card.title: Cyber Healthcare
card.description: Removes Heart Attack and High G Forces
